alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 6:23PM EDT until July 18 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Brown County in southwestern Ohio... Northern Adams County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Highland County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 623 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sardinia, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mount Orab, West Union, Peebles, Winchester, Sardinia, Seaman, Belfast, Emerald, Mowrystown, Cherry Fork, Greenbush, Dunkinsville, Lake Waynoka, May Hill, Buford, Locust Grove, State Route 32 at US Route 68, Fincastle, State Route 32 at US Route 62 and State Route 136 at US Route 62. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
